The  workspace should be cleaned with bleach solution and ethanol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0qio","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7gn3","text":"

guidelines:
{"blocks":[{"key":"ffice","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crk88","text":"     
Nucleic acid must be extracted and handled in a second
designated area, using a separate set of pipettes, filter tips, tube racks,
fresh gloves, lab coats and other equipment.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2gji","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"681is","text":"    
Amplified products must not be pipetted in this area.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"221bq","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkgd8","text":"     
Samples should be stored in designated fridges or
freezers in the same area.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ud5g","text":"

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"csnlk","text":"Prepare sampling kit (sylphium filter, gloves,  ATL buffer, syringe)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq1u9","text":"Find an interesting of environmental site.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0noh","text":"Inject 1-3 L of environmental water into sylphium filter using a clean sterile beaker and 50 ml syringe.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ilec","text":"Inject a volume of 3 ml ATL buffer (Qiagen) in the sylphium filter to be stored at room temperature until it is transferred and processed in the laboratory. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cf4vm","text":"Sylphium filters were stored at 4 °C  once they arrived to laboratory.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ssgv","text":"Incubate Sylphium filter at 56°C  for 30 min to dissolve any crystalls of ATL buffer. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a6lm","text":"Transfer the buffer from the sylphium filter capsule using 3 ml syringe into a 15 mL falcon tube. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7p5d9","text":"Be careful not to apply too much pressure when collecting lysate from sylphium filter. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es9cj","text":"The volume of lysate might vary between 2-3 ml. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fb5up","text":"Add proteinase K  with the ratio 10 µl for 100 µl lysate, Vortex for a few seconds and incubate at 56°C  overnight.\n","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ec1sc","text":"Remove the lysate from the incubator and add equal volume of AL buffer (Qiagen), Vortex for a few seconds and incubate at 56°C  for 10 min.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0mrr","text":"Add equal volume of 99.9% cold ethanol Vortex briefly, ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12h7t","text":"The ratio of sample lysate: AL buffer: Ethanol =1:1:1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17cem","text":"\nRemove the DNeasy min spin column from the vacuum fold ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs4lj","text":"Place it in a new 2 ml collection tube (provided), add 500 µl Buffer AW1, and centrifuge for 1 min at 6000 g or (8,000 rpm). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ppuu","text":"Discard flow-through and collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bj","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gfe5","text":"Place the DNeasy Mini spin column in a new 2 ml collection tube (provided), add 500 µl
Buffer AW2, and centrifuge for 1 min at 20,000 ∗ g (14,000 rpm) t. Discard flow-through and collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tin2","text":"Place spin column in a new collection tube, centrifuge for 2 min at 17,000 ∗ g (13,000 rpm) to dry the DNeasy membrane from ethanol residual. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rptf","text":"

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80lhj","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"827g1","text":"Transfer the spin column to a new 1.5- or 2-mL DNA LoBind tube with caps removed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3n1k","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kpi4","text":"Add 100 µl 70°C Buffer TE (pH 8.0) to the membrane and incubate at room temperature for 10 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"308j4","text":"

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8im9c","text":"Centrifuge for 1 min at 6,000 ∗ g (8,000 rpm) to collect the DNA in 1.5- or 2-mL DNA LoBind tube and discard the spin column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65bf3","text":"


","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vtj7","text":"Quantify the DNA extract with nanodrop photometer to evaluate the quality of extracted DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
